title: Golden Blood
description: She’s an outcast for a reason, but then she meets her soulmate and for the first time ever, she wants to tell someone her secret…Gemma and her family can travel through time in a blink, changing the course of people's lives and redefining history. But what if people knew what they were capable of? Would they try to abuse their gift?For this reason, Gemma has been sworn to secrecy. The constant fear of being found out has turned her into a high school loner, but then she meets Harrison. One touch and her life will be permanently changed. She can't resist him.As the couple delve into this forbidden relationship, Gemma's loyalties are put to the ultimate test... especially when Harrison finds out the truth and she must choose between her family and saving the guy she's falling in love with.
author: Melissa Pearl
